variant.bodyText: Following is a listing of the 1986 members of the Association for Computational Linguistics as of the end of the year. The 1949 personal members are listed first, ordered alphabetically by last name. The 419 institutional members follow, begin- ning with those from the United States, ordered by ZIP-code, and then the rest ordered alphabetically by country, province (for Canada), city, and then institutional name. Wanted: Addresses for the members whose names appear below. Information should be forwarded to the ACL Secretary- Treasurer.

variant.note: 1986 ACL MEMBERSHIP LIST Following is a listing of the 1986
variant.abstract: of the for Linguistics of the end of the year. The 1949 personal members are listed first, ordered alphabetically by last name. The 419 institutional members follow, beginning with those from the United States, ordered by ZIP-code, and then the rest ordered alphabetically by country, province (for Canada), city, and then institutional name. Wanted: Addresses for the members whose names appear below. Information should be forwarded to the ACL Secretary- Treasurer.
